column4: I need help.  I just bought a surround sound system.  My PC has an audio card with a serial-looking port, and 3 jacks (line in, out, mic).  I have 3 separate plugs for the surround sound though...any thoughts?
im no expert on sound setups but if card doesnt suppport 5.1 a nice sound blaster is like $29
can i just pick it up at a local walmart?
er sblive card i mean. yeah
